Hero.title: Fresh Fruits & Vegetables from Morocco to the World
Hero.subtitle: Premium quality produce directly from our farms in Agadir.

About.title: Our Legacy
About.subtitle: Quality Rooted in European Standards
About.description: SARL HOUKMI EXPORT was founded by the HOUKMI FAMILY. With over 35 years of combined experience, this unique leadership ensures that every shipment meets the strictest European quality standards.
About.sub_description: We simply don't just trade; we ensure excellence. Partnering with top-tier farms and packing stations across Agadir, we offer fully customizable packaging solutions and maintain a rigorous cold chain in our dedicated warehousing facilities to ensure freshness.
About.mission: To provide unbeatable prices without compromising on quality, bridging the gap between Moroccan producers and European markets (France, Italy, and beyond).
About.imageCaption: HOUKMI FAMILY - A legacy of quality

Gallery.description: A glimpse into our farms, packing facilities, and the dedicated team ensuring quality in every box.

Contact.title: Request a Quote
Contact.description: Ready to import premium Moroccan produce? Fill out the form below for a tailored quotation.
Contact.name: Full Name

Footer.description: Bringing the freshest fruits and vegetables from Morocco to your table. Quality and reliability since 1990.

oranges_specs.varieties: Clementine, Nour, Maroc Late, Washington Navel

ProductDetails.calabacin_description: Our zucchini are grown in Agadir's coastal microclimate to ensure a perfectly straight shape and vibrant green skin. Harvested daily to maintain maximum crunch.
ProductDetails.cantaloupe_description: Fragrant and sweet Cantaloupe melons. These melons are selected for their distinct netted rind and deep orange, honey-like flesh.
ProductDetails.melon_description: Nurtured under the Agadir sun, our yellow melons offer a refreshingly sweet flavor and smooth texture. Known for their durability during transport.
ProductDetails.alubias_description: Premium flat green beans (Alubias). These beans are hand-selected for their length, width, and absence of strings, perfect for traditional European stews.
ProductDetails.judias_description: Round, fine green beans (Judías). Meticulously sorted to ensure uniform thickness and a satisfying 'snap' when broken. A staple for gourmet presentation.
ProductDetails.climate_advantage_title: Why Agadir Climate Enhances This Product
ProductDetails.trust_description: With over 35 years of experience, HOUKMI EXPORT guarantees a reliable harvest calendar, timely logistics, and consistent supply capacity for all our international partners.
ProductDetails.tomatoes_climate: The stable 21°C average temperature prevents thermal shock, ensuring that our tomatoes develop uniform color and optimal firmness for long-distance transport.
ProductDetails.oranges_climate: Balanced ocean humidity and intense sun exposure result in oranges with exceptional juice content and the perfect sugar-to-acid ratio.
ProductDetails.peppers_climate: Predictable harvest cycles allow us to supply crisp, thick-walled peppers with consistent sizing, meeting the strict demands of European supermarkets.
ProductDetails.zucchini_climate: The temperate coastal weather allows for daily harvesting of tender zucchini that maintain their crunch and deep green luster throughout the export chain.
ProductDetails.watermelon_climate: 300+ days of sunshine ensure highest possible Brix (sugar) levels and a crisp, deep red flesh that customers love.
ProductDetails.melon_climate: Agadir's unique light intensity creates incredibly fragrant melons with a resilient skin, perfect for arrival at destination in pristine condition.
ProductDetails.green_beans_climate: Ocean-regulated temperatures ensure our beans grow straight and tender without becoming fibrous, offering gourmet quality every time.

Agadir.title: Agadir: A Unique Agricultural Microclimate for Reliable Export Supply
Agadir.description: Located on Morocco's Atlantic coast, Agadir offers a strategic agricultural advantage that is unparalleled in the region. The combination of ocean regulation and consistent sunshine creates a powerhouse for premium produce export.
Agadir.climate_desc: Agadir enjoys more than 300 days of sunshine per year, with an average annual temperature of 21°C, providing the perfect environment for year-round production.
Agadir.ocean_desc: The Atlantic Ocean acts as a natural thermoregulator, preventing extreme seasonal variations and ensuring a stable environment for delicate crops.
Agadir.harvest_desc: Consistent weather means consistent growth. We offer reliable supply schedules and uniform crop quality that European and Russian importers can depend on.
Agadir.strategic_desc: Our proximity to major ports and advanced logistics infrastructure makes us the ideal partner for the European and Russian markets.

Join.innovation_desc: We use the latest technologies in logistics and agriculture to ensure quality.
Join.global_desc: Work with a diverse team of professionals from all over the world.
Join.growth_desc: We invest in our people and provide clear paths for professional advancement.
Join.ready_desc: We are always looking for passionate people in logistics, sales, quality control, and agricultural management. Send us your CV today.

mentions_content.intellectual_text: The entire content of this site (text, images, logos, etc.) is the exclusive property of SARL HOUKMI EXPORT or its partners. Any reproduction or representation, in whole or in part, of the site or any of its components, is prohibited.

privacy_content.intro_text: This personal data protection policy is intended to inform users about how SARL HOUKMI EXPORT collects and processes their personal data.
privacy_content.responsible_text: SARL HOUKMI EXPORT is responsible for the processing of personal data collected via the site.
privacy_content.data_collected_text: We collect the data you provide to us via contact or application forms (Last Name, First Name, Email, Phone, CV, etc.).
privacy_content.purposes_text: Your data is processed to respond to your requests, manage your applications, and improve your experience on the site.
privacy_content.rights_text: You have a right of access, rectification, deletion, and opposition to the processing of your data. Contact us at: info@houkmiexport.com.

terms_content.object_text: These Terms of Use define the conditions of access and use of the site by users.
terms_content.access_text: Access to the site is possible 24/7, subject to maintenance operations or force majeure.
terms_content.user_obligations_text: The user agrees to use the site in a lawful manner, not to harm its operation, and to respect intellectual property rights.
terms_content.liability_text: HOUKMI EXPORT strives to provide accurate information but cannot be held responsible for errors or omissions.

cookies_content.definition_text: A cookie is a small text file placed on your terminal when browsing a site.
cookies_content.usage_text: We use cookies to ensure the proper functioning of the site, remember your preferences, and analyze traffic.
cookies_content.management_text: You can set your browser to refuse cookies or be informed of their deposit.
